title: i didnt get the kayn icon
body:
hi,
yesterday i finished the shadow kayn assasin missions to get the icon. after i finished the game and basicly finished the mission its showed that i completed the mission but i didnt get the icon. pls help me. thnx :)

replies.body: No worries just yet! I can see that the Shadow Assassin mission completed but sometimes the rewards can be delayed by a day or so. You should be seeing it show up over the next day or two, but definitely hit me back up if you still don't have it by Sunday!
